description.en: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.ar: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.br: Quando carregados com um Reator Ark, estas luvas podem disparar feixes de energia repulsores. Para personagens masculinos.
description.cns: 当用方舟反应堆充能时，这些手套可以发射排斥光束。仅限男性角色。
description.de: Wenn diese Handschuhe mit einem Ark-Reaktor aufgeladen sind, können sie Repulsor-Strahlen abfeuern. Für männliche Charaktere.
description.fi: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.fil: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.fr: Avez-vous la main de velours pour aller avec ? Pour garçon
description.id: Saat diisi dengan Ark Reactor, sarung tangan ini dapat menembakkan balok tolakan. Untuk karakter pria.
description.it: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.jp: アークリアクターで充電すると、これらの手袋はリパルサービームを発射できます。
description.kr: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.nl: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.pl: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.ru: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.sp: Cuando se cargan con un Reactor Ark, estos Guantes pueden disparar rayos repulsores. (M)
description.sw: When charged with an Ark Reactor, these Gloves can fire repulsor beams. For male characters.
description.th: เมื่อชาร์จด้วย Ark Reactor ถุงมือเหล่านี้สามารถยิงลำแสงขับไล่ได้ สำหรับตัวละครชาย
description.tw: 男用手套，當用電弧反應器充電時，這手套可以發射排斥光束。
description.vi: Khi được sạc bằng Ark Reactor, đôi Gloves này có thể bắn ra các chùm tia mạnh. Dành cho nhân vật nam.
